name: Jungle sphere
description:
This Is The Worst Game Ever Made,Even Below Superfight.Just Dont Play This (Well At Least Its Free).Its also The First Game Ive Ever Publicly Releasd, So Yea :)

Download Instructions If You From Some Reason Downloaded This:

Just Unzip The File Using WinRar Or WinZip,Go To The "Jungle Sphere" folder And Run "Jungle Sphere.exe"
